title: I need 13 more RP to get elementalist lux! :(
body: Is there a way I can buy like 1 more dollar of RP or something? I'm not asking for free RP, but I don't wanna spend more money than I need to....

replies.body: We might be able to work something out.  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or contact us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  We'll help individually to see what we can do!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=44AGo1HE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-27T00:07:26.943+0000)
>
> We might be able to work something out.  Submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or contact us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  We'll help individually to see what we can do!

It honestly really confunds me when I have some random bitty bit of RP left and I come up slightly short for something I want to buy with the available RP purchase options. Why not have an option to purchase the "needed funds" like the Nintendo Eshop and some other online systems do. Just round to the nearest dollar in your favor and if its  more than $10, factor in the bonus RP.

Writing this while I have 57 RP and there's no way to spend it + buying RP and getting any currently existing skin will leave me with some random number remaining.

That said, I do like to see Riot being open minded about various user's unique situations.
Thank you very much for your time.
